alert.note: Alert for Marion; Morgan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 9:53PM EST until March 10 at 7:27PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River, White River, Driftwood River. .Ongoing flooding will continue along portions of the East Fork White, White, and Wabash Rivers and their tributaries. River stages are rising again due to previous rainfall over the weekend. Minor flooding is largely expected, which primarily impacts river roads, parks, and agricultural land. The crest on the Wabash River is between Lafayette and Covington. The crest on the White River is near Spencer. The crest on the East Fork White River is between Seymour and Rivervale. New precipitation amounts through the weekend will not impact current flooding. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Ravenswood. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Water surrounds homes in River Edge Estates. A few streets flood in Ravenswood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 1.5 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued Thursday morning by around 1100 AM EST /1000 AM CST/.
